mapper.select: select ut.nick nick, ut.tel tel, ut.img img from user_table ut, member m where m.s_num=#{sNum} and ut.id=m.id
mapper.insert: insert into study(s_num, study_name, loc, category, content, img, id, deactivation, delete_flag) values(s_code, #{ study_name }, #{ loc }, #{ category }, #{ content }, #{ img }, #{ id }, 'N', 'N')
insert into alarm(a_num,id,category, subject, content) values (a_code, #{leaderId}, #{category}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.update: insert into alarm(a_num,id, category, subject, content ) value (a_code,#{memberId}, #{category}, #{subject}, #{content})
